headline: Tyler Technologies (TYL): Assessing Valuation After a 26% Slide Despite Ongoing Profit Growth
summary: Tyler Technologies stock steadies after extended slide Tyler Technologies (TYL) is trying to find its footing after a weak stretch that has seen the stock fall about 26% over the past year and roughly 16% in the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Tyler Technologies. That slide has come even as Tyler continues to post solid double digit net income growth. This suggests the weak year to date share price return reflects shifting sentiment on valuation more than fundamentals, with longer...
